channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An architect of California’s billionaire tax says he’s an ‘enthusiastic capitalist,’ but the system ‘doesn’t seem to be working.’ He’s got a plan
item.description: "I'm interested in how things work," says Brian Galle, who's also worked with Elizabeth Warren, "and right now, it doesn't seem to be working well."

item.title: Job clingers, beware: research shows you’re more likely to regret staying in a bad job than quitting it
item.description: For anyone clinging to a job they hate, here's a wake-up call: you're statistically more likely to regret staying put than walking away.

item.title: A once-unthinkable C-suite appointment solidifies Walmart’s new identity as a tech company
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Bonds 101: What investors need to know about the ‘shock absorber of the portfolio’
item.description: Many investors ignore them, but bonds can help protect your assets when stock prices tank.

item.title: Senator Tina Smith: My State Showed Courage. Will Republicans?
item.description: Minnesotans have stood up for common decency and our founding principles.

item.title: 3 Things to Know About the Next Winter Storm
item.description: It’s not likely to be as widespread as the last storm, but it could be unwelcome to people still facing piles of snow. Here’s what we know so far.

item.title: U.K.’s Starmer Meets Xi Jinping in Beijing as Ties Warm

item.title: Amazon is closing its futuristic Go and Fresh stores—showing logistics and tech aren’t enough to make old-school retail work
item.description: The e-commerce giant seems unable to nail the brick-and-mortar shopping experience.

item.title: Trump and Schumer Move Toward Possible Deal to Avert a Shutdown
item.description: The president and the top Senate Democrat were discussing an agreement to split off homeland security funding from a broader spending package and nego...

item.title: Netanyahu Vows to Cut Israel’s Reliance on U.S. Military Aid
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu blamed some soldiers’ deaths in the Gaza war on a lack of ammunition caused by a pause in American weapon deliveries...

item.title: She Couldn’t Defend Herself, but He Wasn’t Charged With Rape
item.description: A decision in China not to charge a man who fathered children with a woman with a mental illness has set off a debate about consent and the state’s pu...

item.title: Greenlanders Watching Turmoil in the United States Say No Thanks
item.description: The violence in Minneapolis and President Trump’s threats have soured Greenlanders on the United States and, unexpectedly, pushed them closer to Denma...

item.title: Canada’s New Reality
item.description: What can we learn from Canada’s pivot away from the U.S.?
